items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests.

notes: Assumed the requirement focuses on personalized recommendations for logged-in users; guest user recommendations may be addressed separately.
